note:
在ASMR流中暂停两个创作者，以推动抽搐的社区指南的界限，禁止在自然界中没有相当性的内容，但对其广告业务深度自我意识的平台仍然过于Risqué。亚马逊拥有的公司拒绝发表评论禁令的长度或引发他们的东西，而是指向其关于性成分规则的技术。
 amouranth（kaitlyn siragusa）和indiefoxx（jenelle dagres）可能会在星期一禁令后72小时恢复，但在撰写本文时，这两个频道都仍然无法使用。 Siragusa证实了多边形，在一条溪流之后她被暂停，她在其中瑜伽姿势造成耳朵发出麦克风。
   在抽搐中所谓的“ASMR-Meta”，流拖船通过窃窃私语来提高他们的麦克风或产生舔声的观点，有时持有瑜伽姿势，伴随着上个月爆炸的抽搐中的热水浴缸周围的争议。在这两个情况下，一些抽搐创造者认为平台的规则是有选择地强制执行的。
 “asmr meta和疯狂的瑜伽姿势，相信它或不是我看着另外两个女孩在我将活动折叠成ASMR之前没有任何禁止的禁令，在没有任何禁令的情况下观看2-5k的曲调。在Twitter上写道。 “那些其他拖鞋仍未禁止并继续这样做。我的罪是因为默契的迹象而被淘汰，然后吹掉秘密并击中30k观众。“
 因为ASMR Meta和Hot浴缸Meta由女娱乐者主导，因此整个情况在抽搐界中吸引了更多的厌食症，其中女娱乐仍然经常骚扰平台。
 我将永远发现它讽刺地讽刺地发挥了“暴力视频游戏不会导致枪/暴力犯罪”（我同意），即时转动尾部和放大器;屈服于像“热水浴缸/ asmr女孩的糟糕的糟糕，那里创造了瘟疫其他女孩创造者的爬行者！”
  在一个博客中，在当时从池和热水浴池流出妇女的博客，Twitch写道，“被发现是性感的不是我们的规则，而且抽搐不会对妇女或我们服务的任何人采取执法行动，因为他们的吸引力。“该公司澄清说，虽然卧室的泳衣可能会违反规则，但“上下文适当的”泳装是允许的。 
“我们与性暗示政策的意图是在过度或明确性暗示中绘制一系列内容，而不是禁止所有可以被视为性暗示的内容 - 但我们承认我们的规则并不像他们的那样清晰。
 禁止可以被解释为暗示的每种形式的内容也将导致我们目前允许的视频游戏和高级内容的限制，特别是考虑有时以性别方式呈现或呈现女性角色的方式。“
 它的解决方案是在那里创建一个“游泳池，热水浴池和海滩”类，其中内容可以活。大多数抽搐类别都致力于特定的游戏，其中大多数平台的非游戏流中列出了流行的Catch-All类别“只是聊天”。
 ASMR拥有自己的类别，拥有240万粉丝，包括耳刺刺的ASMR流，不会用更新的裁剪推动抽搐规则的界限。到目前为止，该公司正在选择惩罚它决定穿过该线的任何人来惩罚更多的畜栏性暗示内容。但是，可以所有改变：上个月，抽搐说，它正在努力进一步澄清对性暗示内容的规则。
 不幸的是，对于抽搐 - 对于女性创造者，受到不平坦政策影响的女性创作者 - 耳朵舔流的丰富曲线表明，直到那时，该公司将在灰色区域内绘制一条线，公司将逐渐确定相同的决定它自己的制作。
note_en:
Both creators were  suspended following ASMR streams that pushed the bounds of Twitch’s community guidelines forbidding content that isn’t  quite sexual in nature but is still too risqué for a platform deeply self-conscious about its advertising business. The Amazon-owned company declined to comment on the length of the bans or what provoked them, but pointed TechCrunch toward its rules on sexual content.
 It’s possible that both Amouranth (Kaitlyn Siragusa) and Indiefoxx (Jenelle Dagres) will be reinstated Monday, 72 hours after their Friday ban, but both channels remained unavailable at the time of writing. Siragusa  confirmed to Polygon that she was suspended after a stream in which she did yoga poses while making ear-licking sounds into a microphone.
   The so-called “ ASMR-meta” on Twitch, where streamers boost their views by whispering into their microphones or producing licking sounds, sometimes while holding yoga poses, follows the  controversy around hot tubs on Twitch that exploded last month. In both instances, some Twitch creators believe that the platform’s rules are selectively enforced.
 “With ASMR meta and crazy yoga poses, believe it or not I watched two other girls doing it to the tune of 2-5k views without any bans for months before I folded the activity into ASMR creating the infamous ‘ASMR’ meta,” Siragusa wrote on Twitter. “Those other streamers are still unbanned and continue to do it. My sin was taking inaction as a sign of tacit acceptance, and then blowing the top off the secret and hitting 30k viewers.”
 Because both the ASMR meta and the hot tub meta were dominated by female streamers, the whole situation has attracted even more misogyny within the Twitch community, where  female streamers are still regularly harassed off the platform.
 I will always find it ENORMOUSLY IRONIC that the generation that fought “violent video games don’t cause an uptick in gun/violent crimes”(I agree), instantly turn tail & succumb to a bad take like “HOT TUB/ASMR GIRLS LITERALLY CREATE CREEPERS that plague other girl creators!”
  In a blog addressing the proliferation of women streaming from pools and hot tubs at the time, Twitch wrote that “being found to be sexy by others is not against our rules, and Twitch will not take enforcement action against women, or anyone on our service, for their perceived attractiveness.” The company clarified that while a bathing suit in a bedroom might break the rules, “contextually appropriate” swimwear is allowed.
  “Our intention with the Sexually Suggestive policy was to draw a line on content that is overtly or explicitly sexually suggestive, not to ban all content that could be viewed as sexually suggestive – but we acknowledge that our rules are not as clear as they could be.
 Prohibiting every form of content that could be interpreted as suggestive would also result in far more restrictions on the video games and premium content that we currently allow, especially considering the ways that female characters are sometimes objectified or presented in a sexualized manner.”
 Its solution at the time was to create a “Pools, Hot Tubs, and Beaches” category where that content could live. Most of Twitch’s categories are dedicated to specific games, with most of the platform’s non-gaming streams listed in the popular catch-all category “Just Chatting.”
 ASMR has its own category with 2.4 million followers, encompassing ear-tingling ASMR streams that don’t push the boundaries of Twitch’s rules with the more recent crop of those that do. So far, instead of building out a more thoughtful way to corral sexually suggestive content, the company is opting to punish anybody who it decides crosses the line. But it’s possible that could all change: Last month, Twitch said it was working on new policies to further clarify the rules on sexually suggestive content.
 Unfortunately for Twitch — and for the female creators disproportionately affected by its uneven policies — the abundance of ear-licking streams suggests that until then, the company will be making these same determinations over and over as it tries to draw a line within a gray area of its own making.
title: 抽搐暂停两个流行的ASMR溪流上的一个流行的女性创作者
title_en: Twitch suspends two popular female creators over sexy ASMR streams

note:
根据Pickbook数据，当2020年5月，Couchbase最后一次估值为5.5亿美元的金额估值。尽管有其广泛的筹款历史，但并不是一个独角兽，并不是我们迄今为止首次亮相的独角兽。
 我们想揭示它是否将是一个价格并开始交易的人，因此我们挖掘了Couchbase的商业模式及其财务表现，希望能够更好地了解公司及其市场Comps。
  COICBASE S-1提交详细信息，该公司销售数据库技术。更具体地说，Couchbase为客户提供了数据库技术，包括公司的措辞中的NoSQL（“架构灵活性”），以及将数据与SQL查询提出问题的能力。
 COICBASE的软件可以部署在云上，包括公共云，混合环境中，甚至是在预定的设置中。该公司向大公司销售，在其财政年度的结束时吸引了541名客户，以便在去年收盘生成10780万美元的年度经常性收入。
 Couchbase将其收入分为两个主要桶。首先，订阅包括软件许可收入以及公司称之为“支持和其他”收入，它将其定义为“合同后支持”或PC，这是一揽子产品，包括“支持，错误修复和有权接收未指定的软件更新和升级“合同的长度。
 该公司的第二次收入是服务，这是不言自明的，比订阅产品更低。
note_en:
According to  PitchBook data, Couchbase was last valued at a post-money valuation of $580 million when it raised $105 million in May 2020. The company — despite its expansive fundraising history — is not a unicorn heading into its debut to the best of our knowledge.
 We’d like to uncover whether it will be one when it prices and starts to trade, so we dug into Couchbase’s business model and its financial performance, hoping to better understand the company and its market comps.
  The Couchbase  S-1 filing details a company that sells database tech. More specifically, Couchbase offers customers database technology that includes what NoSQL can offer (“schema flexibility,” in the company’s phrasing), as well as the ability to ask questions of their data with SQL queries.
 Couchbase’s software can be deployed on clouds, including public clouds, in hybrid environments, and even on-prem setups. The company sells to large companies, attracting 541 customers by the end of its fiscal 2021 that generated $107.8 million in annual recurring revenue, or ARR, by the close of last year.
 Couchbase breaks its revenue into two main buckets. The first, subscription, includes software license income and what the company calls “support and other” revenues, which it defines as “post-contract support,” or PCS, which is a package of offerings, including “support, bug fixes and the right to receive unspecified software updates and upgrades” for the length of the contract.
 The company’s second revenue bucket is services, which is self-explanatory and lower-margin than its subscription products.
title: Red Hat的销售给IBM告诉我们关于Couchbase的估值？
title_en: What does Red Hat’s sale to IBM tell us about Couchbase’s valuation?

note:
高度传染的delta变体是最快，最适合的冠状病毒菌株，它将＆＃34;挑选＆＃34;世界卫生组织官员周一警告，最脆弱的人，特别是在Covid-19疫苗接种率低的地方。
 三角洲在印度识别出来，具有潜在的＆＃34;更致命，因为它更有效地在人类之间传递的方式，它最终会发现那些将受到严重生病的脆弱个人，必须是住院和潜在死亡，＆＃34; HOWENTIES计划的执行董事Mike Ryan博士在新闻发布会期间表示。
  瑞安表示，世界领导人和公共卫生官员可以通过捐赠和分配Covid疫苗来帮助捍卫最脆弱的群体。
 ＆＃34;我们可以保护那些脆弱的人，那些前线工作者，＆＃34;瑞安说，＆＃34;以及我们哈文＆＃39;作为总干事（Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus）的事实曾经一次又一次地说过全球水平的灾难性道德失败。＆＃34;
 谁星期五表示，三角洲正在成为全球疾病的主要变种。
 该机构宣布Delta A＆＃34;关注的变体＆＃34;上个月。一个变体可以标记为＆＃34;关注＆＃34;据健康组织称，如果已被证明更具传染性，更致命或更具致命或更具抵抗力的疫苗和治疗。
 三角洲现在替代阿尔法，这是在欧洲和后来的欧洲和后来席卷的高度传染性的变种，儿童疫苗教育中心主任Paul Discit博士在最近的一次面试中表示。 
研究表明，比alpha更可传递大约60％，这比2019年底从武汉出现的原始菌株更具传染性。
  三角洲现在蔓延到92个国家，Maria Van Kerkhove，周一表示，Covid技术领先的技术领先者＆＃39;根据疾病控制和预防的中心，现在占美国所有新案件的10％，并正在成为国家成为主导变种的途径。
 英国最近看到三角洲成为那里的主导变体，超过其原生α变体，该alpha变体在该国最初在该国检测到。 Delta Variant现在占U.K.超过60％的新案例。
 世卫组织官员们表示，有报道称，Delta变异也会导致更严重的症状，但需要更多的研究来确认这些结论。仍然存在迹象表明δ菌株可能会引起不同的症状而不是其他变体。
 没有变种真正发现高传播性和致命性的组合，但增量是＆＃34;那些病毒中最能力，最快，最适合的病毒，＆＃34;谁官员说。
 ＆＃34;这个特殊的Δ变体更快，它更加令人牢采，它将挑选比以前的变体更有效的更脆弱，因此如果有人在没有疫苗接种的情况下留下，它们仍然存在于进一步的风险，而＃34瑞安周一表示。
 van kerkhove说＆＃34;不幸的是，我们不在合适的地方疫苗保护人们＆＃34; 
谁一直敦促富裕国家，包括美国捐赠剂量。 拜登政府早些时候在周一详细介绍它将送达5500万疫苗剂量，其中大多数将通过Covax分发，支持WHO背部免疫计划。  ＆＃34;这些疫苗对严重疾病和死亡非常有效。 这就是他们的意图，这就是他们需要用于＆＃34的东西; van kerkhove说。 ＆＃34;这是Covax和我们所有的合作伙伴都在倡导，这些疫苗达到了最大风险的人。＆＃34;
note_en:
The highly contagious delta variant is the fastest and fittest coronavirus strain yet, and it will "pick off" the most vulnerable people, especially in places with low  Covid-19 vaccination rates, World Health Organization officials warned Monday.
 Delta, first identified in India, has the potential "to be more lethal because it's more efficient in the way it transmits between humans and it will eventually find those vulnerable individuals who will become severely ill, have to be hospitalized and potentially die," Dr. Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's emergencies program, said during a news conference.
  Ryan said world leaders and public health officials can help defend the most vulnerable through the donation and distribution of Covid vaccines.
 "We can protect those vulnerable people, those frontline workers," Ryan said, "and the fact that we haven't, as Director-General (Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus) has said, again and again, is a catastrophic moral failure at a global level."
 The WHO said Friday that delta is becoming  the dominant variant of the disease worldwide.
 The agency declared delta a  "variant of concern" last month. A variant can be labeled as "of concern" if it has been shown to be more contagious, more deadly or more resistant to current vaccines and treatments,  according to the health organization.
 Delta is now replacing alpha, the highly contagious variant that swept across Europe and later the U.S. earlier this year, Dr. Paul Offit, director of the Vaccine Education Center at Children's Hospital of Philadelphia, said in a recent interview.
  Studies suggest it is around 60% more transmissible than alpha, which was more contagious than the original strain that emerged from Wuhan, China, in late 2019.
  Delta has now spread to 92 countries, Maria Van Kerkhove, the WHO's technical lead for Covid, said Monday. It now makes up at least 10% of all new cases in the United States, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, and is on its way to becoming the dominant variant in the nation.
 The United Kingdom recently saw delta become the dominant variant there, surpassing its native alpha variant, which was first detected in the country last fall. The delta variant now makes up more than 60% of new cases in the U.K.
 WHO officials have said there were reports that the delta variant also causes more severe symptoms, but that more research is needed to confirm those conclusions. Still,  there are signs that the delta strain could provoke different symptoms than other variants.
 No variant has really found the combination of high transmissibility and lethality, but delta is "the most able and fastest and fittest of those viruses," WHO officials said.
 "This particular delta variant is faster, it is fitter, it will pick off the more vulnerable more efficiently than previous variants, and therefore if there are people left without vaccination, they remain even at further risk," Ryan said Monday.
 Van Kerkhove said "unfortunately we don't yet have the vaccines in the right places to protect people's lives."
 The WHO has been urging wealthy nations, including the U.S. to donate doses. The Biden administration earlier Monday detailed where it will send 55 million vaccine doses, the majority of which will be distributed through COVAX, the WHO-backed immunization program.
 "These vaccines are highly effective against severe disease and death. That is what they are intended for, and that is what they need to be used for" Van Kerkhove said. "This is what COVAX and WHO and all of our partners have been advocating for, that these vaccines reach people most at risk."
title: 谁说三角洲是最快，最适合的Covid变体，将“挑选”最脆弱的
title_en: WHO Says Delta is the Fastest and Fittest Covid Variant and Will 'Pick Off' Most Vulnerable

note:
Tiktok创建者可能不再需要在至少到某些类型的内容中添加“生物中的链接”。今天，Tiktok推出了跳跃，一种新的创造者通过第三方集成为他们的视频添加交互的新方法。因此，例如，烹饪视频可以通过扫扫描，配方共享应用程序具有成分列表。您可能还可以通过Quizlet添加测验，或通过呼吸呼吸练习。该公司之前已经测试过此功能;截至今天，所有用户都能看到和互动跳跃，但只有A＆＃34;选择＆＃34;群体创建者实际上可以将它们添加到他们的内容中。
 由于您的隐私首选项，此内容不可用。在此处更新您的设置，然后重新加载页面以查看它。
 已批准使用Jump工作的一些平台包括上述扫扫描，呼吸和Quizlet以及维基百科，Statmuse和Tabelog。其他人喜欢Buzzfeed，Jumprope，IRL和Watcha将在未来几周推出。添加内容的例子包括电影评论和美容教程。
  最接近的竞争对手将是Snapchat的迷你，这是基本上的迷你应用程序，让您通过原子购买电影票或从头空间进行冥想练习。 WeChat，Mount Messaging App，也有自己的迷你应用程序。
 “Tiktok已成为一个娱乐和学习的目的地，”Tiktok的产品负责人在新闻稿中写道。 “通过Tiktok跳跃，我们创造了我们社区的”最后一英里“＆＃39; S发现旅程，并帮助激发平台的动作和更深的互动”
 更新，下午3:30 et：这个故事最初表示现在可以为所有用户提供跳跃。虽然所有用户都能够看到具有跳跃的内容，但只有一些创建者目前只能将它们添加到他们的帖子中。
   ENGADGET推荐的所有产品由我们的编辑团队选择，独立于我们的母公司。我们的一些故事包括联盟链接。如果您通过其中一个链接购买某些内容，我们可能会获得联盟委员会。 
由于您的隐私首选项，此内容不可用。 在此处更新您的设置，然后重新加载页面以查看它。
note_en:
TikTok creators may no longer need to add a “link in bio,” at least to certain kinds of content. Today,  TikTok introduced Jump, a new way for creators to add interactivity to their videos via third-party integrations. So, for example, a cooking video could feature a list of ingredients via  Whisk, a recipe-sharing app. You might also be able to add a quiz via  Quizlet, or breathing exercises via  Breathwrk. The company has beta-tested this feature before; as of today, all users will be able to see and interact with Jumps, but only a "select" group of creators will actually be able to add them to their content.
 This content is not available due to your privacy preferences.  Update your settings here, then reload the page to see it.
 Some of the platforms that have been approved to work with Jump include the aforementioned Whisk, Breathwrk and Quizlet, as well as Wikipedia,  StatMuse and  Tabelog. Others like BuzzFeed,  Jumprope,  IRL and  WATCHA will launch in the coming weeks. Examples of added content include movie reviews and beauty tutorials.
  The closest competitor to Jump would be  Snapchat’s Minis, which are essentially mini apps that let you buy movie tickets through Atom or have meditation exercises from Headspace. WeChat, the popular Chinese messaging app, also has its own line of mini apps.
 “TikTok has become a destination both to be entertained and to learn,” wrote Sean Kim, TikTok’s head of product, in a press release. “Through TikTok Jump, we're creating that ‘last mile’ of our community's discovery journey and helping to spark action and deeper interaction both on and off the platform”
 Update, 3:30PM ET: This story originally said that Jumps were now available for all users. While all users are able to see content with Jumps, only some creators are currently able to add them to their posts.
   All products recommended by Engadget are selected by our editorial team, independent of our parent company. Some of our stories include affiliate links. If you buy something through one of these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.
   This content is not available due to your privacy preferences.  Update your settings here, then reload the page to see it.
title: Tiktok推出Tiktok跳转让创作者通过添加包括扫歌曲，维基百科，Quizlet，更多的选择合作伙伴的迷你应用程序集成来增强他们的视频
title_en: TikTok launches TikTok Jump to let creators enhance their videos by adding mini-app integrations from select partners including Whisk, Wikipedia, Quizlet, more

note: 日本电信公司Softbank已宣布他们是第一位，也许是第一个，也许是徕卡携带新智能手机的品牌。 Leitz 1，如您的父母，与您的父母一起，具有巨大的2000万像素，1英寸传感器，如此多的玻璃，磁性镜头盖。  Engadget报告称Leitz 1是一种重创的锐利Aquos R6，具有相同的Leica制造的传感器; 但是，物理设计似乎似乎是视觉差异，并根据规格技术的零售价约为664美元。
note_en:
Japanese telecom company Softbank has announced they'll be the first, and perhaps only, brand to carry a new smartphone from Leica. The  Leitz 1, as you'd expect from its parentage, has a massive 20-megapixel, 1-inch sensor and so much glass that it comes with a magnetic lens cap.
            Engadget reports that the Leitz 1 is a rebranded Sharp Aquos R6, which has the identical Leica-made sensor; however, there do appear to be visual differences in the physical design, and according to  Specs-Tech the R6 retails for about USD $664.
title: Leica正在推出智能手机，带镜头和磁性镜头盖
title_en: Leica Is Launching a Smartphone, with a Lens and Magnetic Lens Cap
